repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the whole text of a commentary on Amalaṉ Āti Pirāṉ by Periyavāccāṉ Piḷḷai and a fragment of Aḻakiya Perumāḷ Nāyaṉār's commentary on the same root text.

msItem.title: Amalaṉātipirāṉ vyākhyānaṃ
msItem.author: Periyavāccāṉ Piḷḷai
msItem.incipit: praṇavaṃ pōle atisaṃkucitamāyiruttal vedamum vedopabṛhmaṇamāṉa maṉā bhāratamum pōle parantu tuṟuppukkīṭāyiruttal
msItem.explicit:
muktaprāpyam-āṉa puruṣārtthattai ya
nubhavittār eṉkaiyālē, ellām avaṉ collāy viṭṭatu. yippāṭṭālē kṛṣṇaṉuṭaiya paṭiyum iṅkē uṇṭ’ eṉkiṟār
msItem.colophon:
tiruppāṇiyāḻvār tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam | ṉayiṉār tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam | jīyar tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam | appaṉ tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam |
17(?)śrīmadvadhūlakulavāridhipūrṇacaṃdraṃ(?)śrīmadvarapradagurūttamaputraratnaṃ śrīśailadeśika kṛpātta samastavidyaṃ śrīraṃgadeśikam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye There is an Ācārya lineage by the name of Kōyil Kantāṭai vādhūla Appaṉ Svāmi Tirumāḷīkai at Śrī Persumpūtūr. Those Svāmis are usually called Appaṉ Svāmi. May be them.

msItem.incipit: aindrīṃ pāṭalayaty alaktarucāmaṃ pṛthvi?tviṣāmaṃ kūrair nānāratnakirīṭakāṃtinivahaiḥ pāśāyuryā?mapiparyuṃke pavamānatūlabharite pāre ca? verātma?-mudākācanamuktidānakuśalānidrātijāgarttivā |1| kāṃtyā kācana kālameghasaṃ?ṣumākallel?sa-pinīpāghorāśita pa-?lena mahasākenāpinnā?ṣāvatī | raṅge kuṃga-?jaṃ?gapuṃgavavapuḥ paryaṃkamāse duṣīnidrāmaṃdita locanā vijayate mudrāmuradrohiṇī |2| idaṃ hi raṃgaṃ tyajatām ihāṃgaṃ punar cāṅgaṃ
msItem.colophon: dhātṛvarṣaṃ puṟaṭṭāsī mācam 31 tēti (?) tiṅkakkiḻamai pañcami punarvasūnakṣatraṃ |

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter-numerals, bottom left Begins again at the beginning of the second text.
supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation, despite the edges of some leaves being broken.

additions.desc: 1r: duṃdubhi varṣaṃ paṅkuṉi uttaraṃ paurṇamiyileḻutiṉatu tirunārāyaṇapurattile.
text 2: + dhātṛvarṣaṃ puṟaṭṭāsī mācam 31 tēti (?) tiṅkakkiḻamai pañcami punarvasūnakṣatraṃ| The year dhātṛ, month of puṟaṭṭāsī 31st, Monday, the fifth day of the fortnight, the Punarvasū asterism.

origin.origDate: duṃdubhi varṣaṃ paṅkuṉi uttaraṃ paurṇamiyileḻutiṉatu tirunārāyaṇapurattile: in the year Duṃdubhi, [month of] Paṅkuṉi [with] the Uttaram asterism, on the full moon day. + dhātṛvarṣaṃ puṟaṭṭāsī mācam 31 tēti (?) tiṅkakkiḻamai pañcami punarvasūnakṣatraṃ |

encodingDesc.p: r = rector v = verso MS = manuscript ISO for Tamil words and IAST for Sanskrit words
